name: Cg Program
summary: Learn about .CG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Cg is a popular choice for multi-platform 3D content development because its language provides a layer of abstraction allowing developers to target OpenGL, DirectX, Windows, Linux, and Mac platforms without using low-level graphics hardware assembly language.
NOTE: Cg stands for "C for graphics" since it is based off of the C programming language.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
